summary: After her mother is murdered, a girl is dressed-to-kill as a Gothic Lolita. Using a deadly umbrella, she seeks revenge by slicing her way through the wacky assassins responsible.
cast: Rina Akiyama|Ruito Aoyagi|Asami|Yukihide Benny|Jonny Caines|Eric Daniel|Carl Fortin|Satoshi Hakuzen|Kyo Hirayama|Mayumi Ido|Yukiha Iguchi|Aya Ikeda|Kenshin Iwakura|Ikuo Iwasa|Yui Iwata|Aiko Kataoka|Hiroyuki Kawahara|Masahumi Kikukawa|Miki Koike|Shigeta Komatsu|Chris Mark|James Mark|Eli Martyr|Tomotaka Misawa|Misaki Momose|Kentaro Nagase|Fumie Nakajima|Masahiro Okamoto|Adrian Persad|Kunihiro Sakaguchi|Mai Shibata|Sinzen|Yuka Tagami|Yuichi Takahashi|Kazuki Tamamura|Minami Tsukui|Yumiko Umegaki|Masato Yamaguchi|Yûrei Yanagi|Taisuke Yano|Yuui
keywords: murderess|blood splatter|woman fights a man|woman murders a man|woman murders a woman
title: Gosurori shokeinin
